duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and repair wires for internet services from hub sites to connection points outside of the customer's home.
Monitor and report signal leakages and repairs as required.
Provide 24/7 coverage, day and night, to maintain the network.
Work independently, communicate clearly with customers and suppliers either in person or on the phone.
Operate appropriate computer or test equipment.
Work outside in all weather conditions, as hours will be dictated by business needs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent work experience
